text: 6.6: 1 T 4.12Nza tɨvir ŋaarira mbuav, nza Fhe Bakɨme nza ndɨɨi ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋra suirigi. Nza vhemkora ndav shiav vhegi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nza tɨvar vhuuŋra gumgi gu mbigi ga mbui. Nza Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ŋkasŋka ndi. Nza vhɨra guigira wari won ndavir gumgi ga ndɨɨi tɨv, nza guigira mba tɨva mbui. Nza vhɨra kamthooŋra mba tɨva bun nzuai fhuvara.
